data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Stojanović, Dalibor Z., Mitić, Bojan M., Gedged, Amna M., Antić, Dragan Ž., Makarov, Slobodan E. (2019): Geophilus serbicus sp. nov., a new species from the Balkan Peninsula (Chilopoda: Geophilomorpha: Geophilidae). Zootaxa 4658 (3): 556-570, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4658.3.7|4 occurrences
